mean_cn: n. 姿势；装腔作势，伪装；  vi. 摆造型；  vt. 主张，提出；引起，导致
mean_en: a particular position in which somebody stands, sits, etc., especially in order to be painted, drawn or photographed
sentence: The beautiful model made a pose for the camera.
sentence_trans: 这个漂亮的模特在镜头前摆出了一个姿势。
word_etyma: pos放 + e → 摆放造型 → pose姿势
